moves.name: Snatch
moves.effect: Returns the target’s raised stats to normal and raises the user’s stats by that amount.

moves.name: All or Nothing!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate. Drastically raises the user’s evasiveness. Drastically lowers the user’s Defense.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.effect: Has a small chance of making the target flinch.

syncMove.name: Card Shark Night Slash
syncMove.description: The power of this move is increased if none of the opponent’s stats are raised.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.
